title: 为什么没权限？
author: 九尾·

replies.author: theoutking
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 九尾·
replies.txt_content:
theoutking 发表于 2015-3-17 12:31
/mangaddp 权限组 essentials.Build
给你指定的权限组加入基本权限
我是想把玩家移到Builder的

replies.author: 九尾·
replies.txt_content:
我输入/manglistp Builder 查看这个权限组的指令后
显示：You are not allowed to use that command

replies.author: theoutking
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 九尾·
replies.txt_content:
theoutking 发表于 2015-3-17 12:39
玩家默认出生就是进入builder组  

如果你修改了出生权限组   而你又想玩家出生个有基本权限  
我是OP我输入/manglistp Builder 查看这个权限组的指令后 /manwhois ID 
都显示：You are not allowed to use that command

replies.author: 九尾·
replies.txt_content:
九尾· 发表于 2015-3-17 12:40
我是OP我输入/manglistp Builder 查看这个权限组的指令后 /manwhois ID 
都显示：You are not allowed to ...
说我不能使用这个指令为何呀OP也不可以么……

replies.author: 九尾·
replies.txt_content: 我后台输入了/manwhois ID 显示：Group: Builder Overloaded: false

replies.author: theoutking
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 九尾·
replies.txt_content:
theoutking 发表于 2015-3-17 12:45
我不知道你是不是设错了 权限组  

你可以试试把自己移到最高权限组：owner
查询buider权限：The group ‘Builder’ has no specific permissions.
Only all permissions from groups：default，g：essentials_builder，g：towny_builder

刚刚手贱按错了

replies.author: 咕噜and呼噜
replies.txt_content: 因为你目前还只是游客用户组，需要移至builder[建筑者？]用户组
